changeSet.author: joemat
changeSet.id: Add a view for getting the latest movements for all assets in micro format
changeSet.createView: SELECT m.move_guid, m.move_heading, m.move_location, m.move_moveconn_id, m.move_timestamp FROM movement.movement m WHERE move_id in (SELECT move_id as id FROM movement.movement b INNER JOIN (SELECT move_moveconn_id, MAX(move_timestamp) as MaxValue FROM movement.movement GROUP BY move_moveconn_id) a ON a.move_moveconn_id = b.move_moveconn_id AND a.MaxValue = b.move_timestamp)
